entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
